mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note (note_no, note_div, sender_id, sender_nm, receive_div, receive_id, receive_ref, receive_nm, employee_id, employee_nm, title, contents, up_note) VALUES (#{noteNo}, #{noteDiv}, #{senderId}, #{senderNm}, #{receiveDiv}, #{receiveId}, #{receiveRef,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveNm}, #{employeeId}, #{employeeNm}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{upNote} )
mapper.select: SELECT note_no as noteNo, note_div as noteDiv, sender_id as senderId, sender_nm as senderNm, receive_div as receiveDiv, receive_id as receiveId, receive_ref as receiveRef, receive_nm as receiveNm, employee_id as employeeId, employee_nm as employeeNm, title, contents, up_note as upNote, read, --등록일이 당일이면:HH24MI 그렇치 않으면: YYYY-MM-DD DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),TO_CHAR(send_dt,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(send_dt,'HH24:MI'),TO_CHAR(send_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD')) sendDt, DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),TO_CHAR(read_dt,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(read_dt,'HH24:MI'),TO_CHAR(read_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD')) readDt FROM note WHERE note_no = #{noteNo} AND note_div = #{noteDiv} AND employee_id = #{employeeId}

SELECT note_no as noteNo, note_div as noteDiv, sender_id as senderId, sender_nm as senderNm, receive_div as receiveDiv, receive_id as receiveId, receive_ref as receiveRef, receive_nm as receiveNm, employee_id as employeeId, employee_nm as employeeNm, title, contents, up_note, read, --등록일이 당일이면:HH24MI 그렇치 않으면: YYYY-MM-DD DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),TO_CHAR(send_dt,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(send_dt,'HH24:MI'),TO_CHAR(send_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD')) sendDt, DECODE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),TO_CHAR(read_dt,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(read_dt,'HH24:MI'),TO_CHAR(read_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD')) readDt FROM note WHERE note_div = #{noteDiv} AND employee_id = #{employeeId}
